title: Danny Perez Ramírez
summary: Danny Perez  (born January 4, 1977) is a Mexican-American professional boxer. He's the former NABF Welterweight, USBA, and WBO NABO Light Middleweight. He holds wins over Julio César García, the 2006 winner of ESPN's The Contender Grady Brewer, and former IBA middleweight Champion Jose Luis Zertuche.
